"The zōt says: hāuuanānəm āstāiia. The rāspīg (says) at the place of the hāwanān and at the right hand of the zōt: azəm vīsāi. The zōt says: ātrauuaxšəm āstāiia. The rāspīg (says) at the place of the ātrawaxš: azəm vīsāi. The zōt says: frabərətārəm āstāiia. The rāspīg (says) at the place of the frabardārān: azəm vīsāi. The zōt says: ābərətārəm āstāiia. The rāspīg (says) at the place of the ābardān: azəm vīsāi. The zōt says: āsnatārəm āstāiia. The rāspīg (says) at the place of the āsnudārān: azəm vīsāi. The zōt says: raēϑβiškarəm āstāiia. The rāspīg (says) at the place of the rēhwiškarān: azəm vīsāi. The zōt says sraōšāuuarəzəm āstāiia dąhištəm aršuuacastəməm. The rāspīg (says) at the place of the srōšāwarzān: azəm vīsāi. The same rāspīg should say standing: yaϑā ahū vairiiō yō zaōtā frā.mē mrītē and the zōt should make aϑā ratuš."

zōt gōwēd hāuuanānəm āstāiia rāspīg pad gāh ī hāwanān ud pad nazdīk ī dast ī rāst ī zōt šawišn ud gōwišn azəm vīsāi zōt gōwēd ātrauuaxšəm āstāiia rāspīg pad gāh ī ātrawaxšān azəm vīsāi zōt gōwēd frabərətārəm āstāiia rāspīg pad gāh ī frabardārān pad nazdīk ī dast ī hōy ī zōt šudan ud guftan azəm vīsāi zōt gōwēd ābərətārəm āstāiia rāspīg pad gāh ī ābardān azəm vīsāi zōt āsnatārəm āstāiia rāspīg pad hgāh ī āsnudārān azəm vīsāi zōt raēϑβiškarəm āstāiia rāspīg pad gāh ī rēhwiškarān azəm vīsāi zōt sraōšāuuarəzəm āstāiia dąhištəm aršuuacastəməm rāspīg pad gāh ī srōšāwarzān azəm vīsāi ud ham ēdōn az pāy guftan yaϑā ahū vairiiō yō zaōtā frā.mē mrūtē zōt aϑā ratuš kardan

az nūn nigārag hangōšīdag ī urwēs ud ādurgāh ud zōtiz ud rāspīg ēn kū gāh cīyōn abāyēd baxtan gāh ī hāwanān ud ātrawaxšān ud frabardārān ud ābardān ud āsnudārān rēhwiškarān srōšāwarzān čē ēwēnag baxšīhēd ēn cīyōn abar nibišt ēstēd rāspīgān har ēk pad gāh ī ēstād tā bowandag haftgāh cīyōn paydāgēnēd

"The zōt says: hāuuanānəm āstāiia. The rāspīg has to go to the place of the hāwanān, near to the right hand of the zōt and say: azəm vīsāi The zōt says: ātrauuaxšəm āstāiia. The rāspīg (says) at the place of the ātrawaxšān: azəm vīsāi. The zōt (says): frabərətārəm āstāiia. The rāspīg should go to the place of the frabardārān, near to the left hand of the zōt and say: azəm vīsāi. The zōt (says): ābərətārəm āstāiia. The rāspīg (says) at the place of the ābardān: azəm vīsāi. The zōt (says): āsnatārəm āstāiia. The rāspīg (says) at the place of the āsnudārān: azəm vīsāi. The zōt (says): raēϑβiškarəm āstāiia. The rāspīg (says) at the place of the rēhbiškarān: azəm vīsāi. The zōt (says): sraōšāuuarəzəm āstāiia dąhištəm aršuuacastəməm. The rāspīg (says) at the place of the srōšāwarzān: azəm vīsāi. And he himself should say standing: yaϑā ahū vairiiō yō zaōtā frā.mē mrūtē and the zōt should make aϑā ratuš."

"From now on, this is the picture of the disposition of the urwēs and ādurgāh and so it is how the zōt and rāspīg have to distribute their places. The places of the hāwanān, ātrawaxšān, frabardārān, ābardān, āsnudārān, rēhwiškarān and srōšāwarzān are distributed as it is written. Each rāspīg stays at his place until the end. The even positions are as depicted.

pas rāspīg ō dašn ālag ī zōt ēstādan zōt kū hāuuanānəm āstāiia rāspīg guftan kū azəm vīsāi zōt guftan kū ātruuaxšəm āstāiia ātrawaxš pad gāh ham ī ātrawaxšān pāsoxēnīd kū azəm vīsāi ham pad dast ī rāspīg bar-ā-bār ī ātaxš gāh zōt guftan frabərətārəm āstāiia rāspīg pad dast ī čab ī zōt bar-ā-bar ī sar ī barsom pad gāh ī frabardārān šudan ēn pāsox guftan azəm vīsāi zōt guftan kū ābərətəm āstāiia rāspīg pad dast ī čab ī zōt bar-ā-bar ataxš gāh pad ī gāh ī aberetān ēn guftan ku azəm vīsāi zōt guftan kū āsnatārəm āstāiia rāspig pad dast ī rāst ī zōt madyān ī ataxš ud barōm pad gāh āsnudārān ēn guftan ku azəm vīsāi zōt guftan kū raϑβiškarəm āstāiia rāspīg pad dast y čab ī zōt madyān ī ataxš barsom pad gāh rēhbiškar ēn guftan kū azəm vīsāi zōt guftan kū sraošāuuarəzəm āstāiia dą̇hištəm aršuuacastəməm rāspīg war ō warl ātaxš ud sar ī barsōm pad gāh ī srōšawarzān ēn guftan kū azəm vīsāi pas rāspīgān wāz gīrišn zōt aϑā ratuš.

Then, the rāspīg should stand at the right hand of the zōt and the zōt should say: hāuuanānəm āstāiia. The rāspīg should say: azəm vīsāi. The zōt should say: ātruuaxšəm āstāiia. The ātrawaxš at the proper place of the ātrawaxšān should answer: azəm vīsāi. Also at the side of the rāspīg, the zōt at the level of the fire, the zōt should say: frabərətārəm āstāiia. The rāspīg should go to the left hand of the zōt, opposite the end of the barsom, to the place of the frabardārān and say this answer: azəm vīsāi. The zōt should say: ābərətəm āstāiia. The rāspīg should say the following at the left hand of the zōt, at the level of the ātaxšgāh, at the place of the frabardārān: azəm vīsāi. The zōt should say: āsnatārəm āstāiia. The rāspīg should say the following at the right hand of the zōt between the fire and the barsom, at the place of the āsnudārān: azəm vīsāi. The zōt should say: raϑβiškarəm āstāiia. The rāspīg should say the following at the left hand of the zōt, between the fire and the barsom, at the place of the rēhwiškar: azəm vīsāi. The zōt should say: sraošāuuarəzəm āstāiia dą̇hištəm aršuuacastəməm. The rāspīg should say the following face to face to the fire and to the end of the barsom: azəm vīsāi. Then, the rāspīg has to take the wāz and the zōt (to make) aϑā ratuš.

Quotations.ab: Cf. N28.41 (cf. Kotwal and Kreyenbroek, 2003 pp. 98-99:

zōt ka hāuanānəm āstāiia nē gōwēd {ka nē pad kardag mad estēd} u-šān pad yašt ī keh be *rāyēnīd pad wīsparad ud bagān yasn šāyēd būdan rāspīg ka azəm vīsāi nē gōwēd ī pad kār andar yazišn pad tis-iz kār nē šāyēd ka ēk pad gāh-ē hamē be gōwēd pad hamāg kār šāyēd

"If the zōt does not say hāuanānəm āstāiia {if it is not a cermony with kardag}, then they have arranged it as a yašt ī keh. This might happen in the Visperad or the Bagān Yašt. If the rāspīg does not say azəm vīsāi for his participation in the yazišn, he is not authorized for any function. If he says once in one gāh, he is authorized for any function."
Cf. N64.1-3 (cf. Kotwal and Kreyenbroek, 2003 pp. 274-275:
ẏasca aētaēšąm raθβą paoiriiō paiti.ā.jasāt̰ hāuuanānəm aētəm āstaiieiti bitīm ātrauuaxšəm ϑritīm frabərətārəm tūirīm *dānazuuāzəm puxδəm āsnatārəm xštūm raēθβiškarəm haptaθəm sraōšāuuarəzəm.

"The one of the auxiliary priests who arrives first, the zaōtar appoints him as hāuuanāna, the second as ātrauuaxša, the third as frabərətar , the fourth as dānazuuāza, the fifth as āsnatar, the sixth as raēθβiškara, the seventh as sraōšāuuarəza."

ab.ab: "The chief priest recites alone hāuuanānəm āstāiia. Standing on the right hand side of the chief priest, the assistant priest recites: azəm vīsāi. The chief priest recites alone ātruuaxšəm āstāiia. Standing on the right side of the chief priest facing the fire, the assistant priest recites: azəm vīsāi. The chief priest recites alone: frabərətārəm āstāiia. Standing on the left hand side of the chief priest, the assistant priest recites: azəm vīsāi. The chief priest recites alone: ābərətəm āstāiia. Standing on the left side of the chief priest facing the fire-place, the assistant priest recites: azəm vīsāi. The chief priest recites alone: āsnatārəm āstāiia. Standing on the right side of the chief priest between the seat of the chief priest and the fireplace, the assistant priest recites: azəm vīsāi. The chief priest recites alone: raēϑβiškarəm āstāiia. Standing on the left side of the chief priest between the seat of the chief priest and the fireplace, the assistant priest recites: azəm vīsāi. The chief priest recites alone: sraōšāuuarəzəm āstāiia dąhištəm aršuuacastəməm. Standing in front of the chief priest near the plate of the fire, the assistant priest recites: azəm vīsāi.
